result.name: cross-savings-pensions-longitudinal-data
result.notes: Longitudinal data on cross savings & pensions, used for analysis and publication of savings statistics. Updated: annually. Data coverage: 2003/04, 2004/05, 2005/06, 2006/07, 2007/08, 2008-09, 2009-10, 2010-11 (in development)

organization.name: hm-revenue-and-customs
organization.title: HM Revenue and Customs
organization.description:
What we do

We are the UK’s tax authority. We are responsible for making sure that the money is available to fund the UK’s public services and for helping families and individuals with targeted financial support.

HMRC is a non-ministerial department, supported by 2 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs
